query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `temporalAnalysisConfigs` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `analysisType` ENUM('individual', 'comparativa', 'departamento', 'organizacional') NOT NULL,
  `periodType` ENUM('mensal', 'trimestral', 'semestral', 'anual', 'customizado') NOT NULL,
  `startDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `endDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `employeeIds` TEXT,
  `departmentIds` TEXT,
  `includeAllActive` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  `metricsToAnalyze` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `includeGoals` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `includePir` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `include360` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `includeCompetencies` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `compareWithPreviousPeriod` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `compareWithDepartmentAvg` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `compareWithOrgAvg` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `significantChangeThreshold` INT DEFAULT 15 NOT NULL,
  `criticalChangeThreshold` INT DEFAULT 30 NOT NULL,
  `active` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `createdBy` INT NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2zjpxFGuGsCP7jR.root --database Vd5BJ8toX8cUC4zST6itFN --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `temporalAnalysisConfigs` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `analysisType` ENUM('individual', 'comparativa', 'departamento', 'organizacional') NOT NULL,
  `periodType` ENUM('mensal', 'trimestral', 'semestral', 'anual', 'customizado') NOT NULL,
  `startDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `endDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `employeeIds` TEXT,
  `departmentIds` TEXT,
  `includeAllActive` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  `metricsToAnalyze` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `includeGoals` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `includePir` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `include360` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `includeCompetencies` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `compareWithPreviousPeriod` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `compareWithDepartmentAvg` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `compareWithOrgAvg` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `significantChangeThreshold` INT DEFAULT 15 NOT NULL,
  `criticalChangeThreshold` INT DEFAULT 30 NOT NULL,
  `active` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `createdBy` INT NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
